Minor Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor

Complete the following:: MATH 151 - Calculus and Analytic Geometry I (4)
MATH 152 - Calculus and Analytic Geometry II (4)
MATH 301 - Introduction to Mathematical Analysis I (4)

Electives (6-8 credits): Excluding MATH 380, MATH 432, STAT 350, and STAT 351, two additional mathematics or statistics courses numbered 300 or higher.
